participant_1.background:
I made sure to take my dog on a walk every day while I was on vacation.
I'm happily married to the love of my life.
i have been married for five years.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
i ve a younger sibling.

participant_2.background:
I have been taking care of the children for a long time and they feel like my family.
i like visiting art museums in my spare time.
my dog s name is toto.
i m allergic to cats.
i love to skate and ski.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! Thank you for asking! How are you today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I enjoy going to art museums in my spare time. I also like to skate and ski. What about you?
I enjoy playing the guitar. I have been playing for about 10 years now and I love it! I also love taking my dog on walks. He is a great companion.
That is really cool! I have never been able to play an instrument. I am impressed! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a Golden Retriever. He is the sweetest dog ever! I love taking him to the park and playing fetch with him.
Those are the best dogs! They are so friendly and loving. I am allergic to cats, so I have always had dogs.
I am glad you enjoy dogs! They are great pets. So, what do you do for work?
I am a child care provider. I have been taking care of children for a long time and they feel like my family.
That is amazing! I am sure you are a great child care provider. I could not imagine taking care of children all day long!
It can be challenging, but it is also very rewarding. I love seeing the children grow and learn.
That is great! I am glad you enjoy your job
